subject: International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology (IJAST) SCOPUS Q3 Indexed Journal
body:
International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology

ISSN: 2207-6360

Journal URL:http://www.ijritcc.com/sendy/l/7763wC9IuFJ3763uqOqnowUIIA/PwdJ8tljigkaVoDRYgKPaA/ntp8fe5C7634D5KldPfe4n8w

Call For Papers - November- 2019 (Paper Submission Deadline 10 November 2019)

IJAST is the one of the renowned, fully OPEN ACCESS International Engineering Journal with more than 200000 monthly content viewers. IJAST is trusted by more than 60,000 satisfied authors worldwide & growing rapidly.

We are happy to invite you to submit your next article of your research/review/study inengineering research area under IJAST domain for publication upcoming issue of IJAST.

Publication FeeUSD 220

Submit manuscript by emailing us to ijast@sersc.orgor submit online by the link below:

Paper Submission Link:http://www.ijritcc.com/sendy/l/7763wC9IuFJ3763uqOqnowUIIA/PwdJ8tljigkaVoDRYgKPaA/ntp8fe5C7634D5KldPfe4n8w/about/submissions
IJASTManuscript Template:http://sersc.orgf/journals/downloads/PaperFormat(MS-Word).doc
Thanking You,

Editorial Team

International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology
